string.text: You should not have been in contact with Owl. I can offer you a headstart on a certain artifact order - about three or four hours. Just enough time to beat the other stalkers, no?
Greetings from Zulu.
Zulu? How is the old bastard? Haven't heard from him for a while.
Yeah, about that... we're planning a trip to Pripyat. We've found an underground tunnel. Would you be willing to go with us?
Pripyat?! Are you crazy? Why would I go back there? I cannot go. There's a huge wave coming - who will guard the Ark and all that come within it? The flood is coming! I cannot go!
Ok, ok.. the wave. Ok, I'll leave.
Remember! Only a select few will be saved!
I get it. Only your favourites.
Tremor's PDA
Let me look... wow, quite a bit of news! Very, very interesting... 1000, my final offer.
Deal.
Relax. I'm just passing through.
Can you take me to Pripyat?
No, sorry. Bit out of the way for me. If you want to get to Yanov, though, I can help you out.
Hey, can you take me to Pripyat?
No, sorry. Try asking Garry. He's got a route there, I hear.
Suit yourself.
Suit yourself. I'm always here.
It's your business.
It's your business. If you want me, I'm always here.
If you get some money, come and see me.
No money, no deal. Come back when you've got some.
No money? Then forget about it.
I don't give my services for free. Come back when you can pay.
Can you take me to Zaton?
Man, there's nothing for me there. Why would you ask me that? If you want to go there, ask Pilot. He knows that route better than anyone.
Can you take me to Zaton?
Zaton? You insult me, stalker. Pilot could get you there, of course. I can take you back to Yanov, but that's about it.
As you wish.
When you get some cash come back and see me, then.
Oh... it's you.
What more do you want? Let's go...
I need a battery for the Gauss.
No problem, but to make the battery I'm going to need a "Flash" artifact.
Here's the artifact.
I'll think about it.
I haven't got a Flash
I've got some vodka. Fancy a drink?
Don't be stingy. Hand it over, and let's have a drink!
Bottom's up!
No, not at the moment. I've still got some raids to do...
Fancy another?
Does a Boar shit in the woods? Of course.
Cheers!
Better not... one's enough.
Hey... I've got a third bottle... fancy some more?
I'll drink to that!
Here goes nothing...
I think I've hit my limit...
No more drink... I thought some food would help but it hasn't.
Here, take this medkit. But be careful, man, I've only got one... if you get taken out, we're all screwed.
Thanks, I'll be careful.
Hey do you know anything about that guy in the "Ark"? He keeps going on about some Big Wave. I barely got out of there alive...

You mean Noah? Yeah, who else could you mean... guy's pretty crazy. Me and him go way back... he took out a snork with his bare hands once to save me. I'd rather be on his side than not, you get me? Here's a crazy little story about him... not sure if it's true or not, but nothing would surprise me about him. Turns out he lived in Pripyat before the Second Disaster. Well, I say lived - he was squatting in a makeshift shack out on the outskirts. The god damn meltdown happened, and the crazy bastard slept through the entire thing! They say he was one of the first "stalkers" in Pripyat. He came out from the North, babbling incoherently about a huge wave and god knows what else. Luckily we didn't know about Zombies back in those days or they'd have probably shot him down on the spot.
Wow.
Tell me about yourself.

What's there to tell? You cut me in half, you'd find "Duty" right down the middle. Been here since the beginning... got to be about three years now? I keep to myself, mostly. Those Freedom bastards are in the station now... some sort of truce. Apparently I had something to do with it. I don't feel particular ill-will towards them... but Duty and Freedom go way back... some bloody battles. Just seems wrong for us to be together, no matter what the situation.
Why did you leave Duty?

You never really leave Duty. I'm still a rank and file member. Will be for the rest of my life. Only Death or Dishonourable Discharge makes you no longer a part of Duty. The situation is fucked... there was a large emission about to hit. Once you know the Zone, you get to sense these things.. and we were in a skirmish with some Freedom. It was a bad situation. An emission about to hit, and our only salvation was our sworn enemies. I gave the warning, but a lot of our guys couldn't make it in time. Apparently Freedom decided that they couldn't let people, even Duty, if you can believe it, die in such a way so they risked their life to drag our guys to safety. After that the top brass decided that maybe Freedom weren't so bad after all. There's a temporary ceasefire in the station. The Loners are our buffer. Buffer or not, Freedom and Duty are sworn enemies.. and that's not my scene, you know?
What do you want?
You again? What do you want?
Hey man, recognize this weapon? I found it in a stash in Jupiter...
Let me see that... wow, I never thought I'd see this baby again. I ran out of bullets so had to leave it there. Had some good times, me and her... thanks for finding it.
I don't feel like talking right now. Fuck off.
What is it? Can't you see I'm relaxing? Fuck off and leave me alone.
Fuck off, stalker. I'm busy.
Ok. What crawled up your ass and died?
Tell me about yourself.

I'm your standard Sawbones, I guess. Came here as a free stalker many years ago. I had studied medicine back in the Great Land, but there were a few incidents and I couldn't go back. Luckily the Zone forgives all, I guess. I was stationed with Freedom for a while. Some poor group of stalkers got caught in an anomaly in the Warehouses. One guy was killed instantly, the other was badly bleeding. I had to cauterize the poor bastard's wounds with a flare then drag him a mile to the nearest outpost - A Freedom base. I fixed him up, and was recruited for a short while. Back then they were struggling to hold the Monolith back at the Barrier. Such an old term now... when the Scorcher was turned off, I headed up north. Figured there would be plenty of opportunities for a guy skilled at stitching people back together again. So here I am. It's not too bad... get my own private room and patients from both sides of the conflict. I don't judge... heh.
Tell me about yourself.

Eh... not much to say. I started like most guys back in the Cordon. You ever been there? Got my first weapon from Sid, and not long after that jumped straight into my first anomaly without any protection. Can you imagine that? It's a miracle I managed to survive. I went about my business, much more careful this time, and made a fair trade as a stalker. Decided to give up that game, though. I heard some crazy bastard managed to turn off the Brain Scorcher, so the way to the north was open. I figured there would be more opportunities up north... the road less travelled, y'know? Got up there, and set up shop near here. Decided to open business for stalkers in the area. Why risk my own ass when there's a bunch of crazy bastards willing to do it for you, right? Don't regret it one bit.
Hey, what happened to that guy around here?

I guess you mean Vano? No idea... he left here a few days ago. Haven't seen him since. Rumour has it he had some trouble with the bandits. Stupid bastard probably got his head blown off trying to settle a score.
Hey what happened to Vano?
No idea... he left a few days ago. Haven't seen him since. Rumour has it he had some trouble with the bandits. Stupid bastard probably got his head blown off trying to settle a score.
The boss might know more... you should talk to him.
If you have any questions I'd advise you to talk to the boss. He's a master.
If you want to know something "big" then talk to the Boss.
Good to see you.
Hey.
Cool.
I found a rare artifact called "Compass". Interested?
Definitely interested. I'd be willing to offer 14000.
Deal.
No, I'll look for another buyer.
Fine, but I'm not changing my price.
I found a strange gun. Have you ever seen anything like it?
Curious.. it bears some resemblence to an old project we worked on.. the EM1, but it seems to function completely different. I'm afraid I can't help you with this one, stalker.
I found a strange gun. Have you ever seen anything like it?
Wow! Now this is a gun! I'm pretty knowledgable about these sorts of things.. but I don't think I've ever seen anything quite like this. Sorry, can't help you much...
Tell me about yourself.

Eh... quite a story there. Used to roll with the bandits. Well, not really roll... I sort of got involved with them somehow, back when they were still struggling for the Zone. Made good friends with the technician... well, not really good friends. More like drinking buddies. There was a raid.. I think? Don't know how the hell I got out of there. Maybe I was so drunk they thought I was dead. When I woke up, everyone was dead... I grabbed a stalker suit and made my way in the world. If you fall off a horse, get back on it and all that... wound up here, next to the Duty guys. Nitro here took me under his wing. Well, not really under his wing.. more like drinking buddies. Heh, funny old world, eh?
Hrr...
Hey man, you ok?
Ughhh... head hurts.... vodka...
Vodka? Here you go.
Sorry, I've got no vodka.
I think you've had enough already.
Oh man, you saved me...
Well come on stalker... get up.
Hrr....
Once a drunk, always a drunk I guess.
Man, what do you want? I'm trying to sleep....
